data.title: All My Children Multiple Choice Quiz | Television
data.meta_description: Welcome to my All My Children pop quiz. If you have been a die hard fan for years this quiz will be easy. Some questions cannot be answered by just simply watching the show.
data.text:
Quiz Answer Key and Fun Facts

1. Who is Erica Kane's oldest daughter from when she was raped at age 14?

Answer: Kendall Hart

When Kendall Hart arrived in Pine Valley in 1993 she was played by actress Sarah Michelle Gellar. Sarah won an Emmy Award in 1994 for her role as Kendall.

2. Which pair of characters were twins on "All My Children"?

Answer: all of the these

Finola Hughes got her start in daytime on "General Hospital" playing the same character, Anna Devane.

3. When we were introduced to Boyd Larabee in 2002, what was his position at Enchantment?

Answer: chemist

Boyd is Enchantment's chemist. In April 2003, Boyd created an anti-aging formula for Erica's company and everyone was after it but the formula stayed in Boyd's head until they applied for a patent.

4. Who is Palmer and Opal Cortlandt's son?

Answer: Petey

Petey Cortlandt is a little business man like his father. In 2002, we saw him win money gambling, blackmail people and steal money from purses. Opal has her hands full with this kid.

5. Who is Greenlee's biological father?

Answer: Jackson Montgomery

Greenlee was told in 2003 that Roger really wasn't her father and that Jackson really was. Greenlee saved Jackson's life by having the same rare blood type.

6. What TV/movie star portrayed Kendall Hart when she arrived in Pine Valley in 1993?

Answer: Sarah Michelle Gellar

Sarah Michelle Gellar went on to play Buffy on "Buffy the Vampire Slayer". "BTVS" came to a close after seven seasons in May 2003. Sarah is also a spokesmodel for Cover Girl cosmetics.

7. Was Tad Martin married to Liza Colby before he married Dixie?

Answer: No

Tad and Liza have known each other since high school when Tad was sleeping with Liza and her mother, Marion, at the same time.

8. Who is Erica Kane's mother?

Answer: Mona

When Frances Heflin (Mona) passed away in June 1994, the writers wrote it into the script and had her die in her sleep two months after her actual death.

9. Who was Leo DuPre married to when he was killed by his mother, Vanessa, in 2002?

Answer: Greenlee

Leo's first wife was Laura but they only married because Leo felt obligated due to Laura's heart problems. Laura is the daughter of Brooke English. Bianca was Leo's best friend and also a lesbian.

10. Was Erica Kane introduced as a character on "All My Children" from the beginning in 1970?

Answer: Yes

Susan Lucci won her first Emmy Award for playing Erica in 1999 after 19 nominations. It became a joke every year the Emmys rolled around.

11. What character did tv/movie star Lauren Holly play on the show from 1986-1989?

Answer: Julie Chandler

Lauren Holly (Julie) is best known as comedian Jim Carrey's ex-wife. Lauren went on to star in such movies as "Dumb and Dumber" with Jim Carrey and "Sabrina" with Harrison Ford and Greg Kinnear.

12. Has singer Jimmy Buffet ever done a cameo on the show?

Answer: Yes

Jimmy Buffet played a bar fly playing pin ball at Foxy's Bar and had a brief speaking part talking to Benny (Vasili Bogazianos). Jimmy's best song is "Margaritaville" and it's also the name of a bar he owns.

13. In 1981, Erica Kane did a TV commercial for her company with what NFL football team?

Answer: New Orleans Saints

The New Orleans Saints have never made it to the Super Bowl but have won two NFC West titles. The Saints were founded in 1966.

14. In 2002, Cady McClain, who portrayed Dixie Martin since 1989, was killed off the show in a car accident in Switzerland. What daytime soap did she go to at the end of 2002?

Answer: "As The World Turns"

After leaving "AMC" in 2002, Cady went on to play Rosanna Cabot on "As The World Turns" on CBS. Rosanna is the complete opposite of Dixie, she is evil and ruthless.

15. Who cheated off of Maggie's first pre-med midterm test in April 2003?

Answer: Henry

Henry freezes up on tests and Maggie let him cheat because she knows that he is the smartest one in the class. The only problem is that the Professor thinks Maggie cheated off of Henry and he doesn't want to fess up. There goes that love affair.

16. Who is Tad Martin's biological father?

Answer: Ray Gardner

Michael E. Knight (Tad) has been on and off the show since 1982. He left the show in 1986 to star in the movie "Date with an Angel" but returned again in 1988.

17. Are Mia and Liza cousins?

Answer: No

Liza and Mia are sisters, they have the same father. Their father cheated on Liza's mom, Marion, with Mia's mother.

18. Who opened Pine Valley's local boarding house in 1976?

Answer: Myrtle Fargate

Eileen Herlie has portrayed Myrtle Lum Fargate since 1976. At one time or another, everyone on the show stays at "The Fargate House". She is the resident protector of all the children on "All My Children".

19. In 2002, which one of Vanessa Courtlandt's sons set the fire in Bianca's room and burned down Erica Kane's house?

Answer: Trey Kenyon

Sam Page (Trey) has starred on several TV shows such as, "Popular" and "7th Heaven". Trey was sent to prison at the end of 2002 for admitting he burned Erica's house down to hide Chris's Proteus files.

20. Which actress played Jesse Hubbard's wife Angie from 1982-1990?

Answer: Debbi Morgan

Debbi Morgan is a veteran actress, she has starred in various tv shows such as "Charmed" and "Strong Medicine".

21. Who eloped with David Hayward in 2002 but divorced him and had a baby with him in 2003?

Answer: Anna Devane

David married Anna when she was the chief of police so she wouldn't have to testify against him in court when he was accused of drugging everyone on Ryan Lavery's yacht. David is Alex and Greenlee's brother in law. David and Erica were lovers a few years back.

22. Which of the following characters are brothers on "All My Children"?

Answer: none of these

Some of the following are brothers from over the years on "All My Children": Leo, Trey and David, Tad and Jake, Edmond and Dimitri, and Travis and Jack. From 1970-2003, most of the above have been romantically involved with Erica Kane at one time or another... too funny!

23. What actress from "NYPD Blue" starred as Jenny Gardner Nelson on "All My Children" from 1981-84 until she was killed off in a jet ski explosion meant for her husband, Greg?

Answer: Kim Delaney

Kim Delaney left "NYPD Blue" to star in her own series "Philly" which got dropped by the network shortly after. Kim returned to "NYPD Blue" as Diane Russell in May 2003 on Episode 21 "Yo, Adrian".

24. Which one of Erica's past leading men is Bianca's biological father?

Answer: Travis Montgomery

Eden Riegel (Bianca) had a small part in the 1999 movie "American Pie" in which she played Sarah, a naive sophmore that Stiffler was trying to seduce. Before starring on "All My Children", Eden was a student at Harvard and was a White House intern.

25. What old TV western series did David Canary, who plays Adam Chandler, star in as the character Candy?

Answer: "Bonanza"

David Canary has double duty on "All My Children" playing twin brothers Adam and Stuart Chandler.

Source: Author crazybombshell

This quiz was reviewed by FunTrivia editor ladymacb29 before going online.

Any errors found in FunTrivia content are routinely corrected through our feedback system.
